1.0.6.name: wordpress/paltip-plug-in
1.0.6.description:
The PalTip plug-in helps you get the most out of your blog post links and product reviews with zero effort. The PalTip plug-in locates links you have included in your posts and automatically converts them with a new PalTip affiliate link. This new affiliate link lets you earn money from the traffic you generated.

Share a tip, earn your share!

How it works:

  • Write your blog post and include links as usual.
  • When the plug-in is activated, the work is done instantly.
  • Your links have now become PalTip links - your own personalized affiliate link.
  • Saves you time - no more back office nightmares or feed organization required.
  • PalTip has partnered with more than 2500 affiliate programs and we are adding more all the time.
  • For more information on PalTip a
